content.rendered:
Jisora

VISIT SITE

ABOUT

Jisora is a brand born from the understanding of the struggle between choosing style and comfort. Jisora aims to revolutionize women’s fashion. Their mission is clear: to create pieces that blend effortless style with unmatched comfort. Jisora firmly believes that fashion should never be a compromise. With Jisora, women can savor every moment, feeling empowered and inspired.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Packaging Design
  • UI/UX
  • Shopify Development

INDUSTRY

  • Clothing

CHALLENGES

Everyday Elegance
Elevated

01

Building a word-class e-commerce experience that can be structured on Shopify

02

Rebuilding the digital identity for Jisora

03

Building a responsive design for both website and mobile along with micro interactions and animations

04

Meeting speculated timelines for UI/UX and development

SOLUTION

A Playful
Rebrand

By balancing contemporary trends with enduring styles, Jisora ensures that every piece in their collection offers a harmonious blend of innovation and tradition. This thoughtful approach allows Jisora to create fashion that is inclusive and versatile, making everyone feel confident and stylish, regardless of age

Redesigning
Future

IDENTITY

Jisora has been rebranded with vibrant colors to reflect its pop and colorful designs, giving the brand a fresh and lively appeal. The new look is friendly and inviting, attracting Gen Z and young individuals alike. Bold geometric patterns and playful shapes infuse the brand with energy and life, making it stand out in the fashion world.

A New Era of Elegance Awaits

WEB DEV

A seamless and playful rebrand of the web experience to position Jisora as the Market leaders they are.

IMPACT

A Bold New
Look to the Brand

The rebrand has revitalized Jisora’s image, making it more dynamic and relevant in the competitive fashion industry. It has fostered a stronger connection with a broader audience, driving growth and reinforcing the brand’s mission to blend effortless style with unmatched comfort.
